rules_text:
Komano Aunn can block an additional two creatures each combat.
{2}{G}{W}, Reveal Aunn from your hand: Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. [i](This ability works on creatures that can't be blocked.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I'm Komano the komainu, this shrine's guardian god! Nothing's getting past me!” [/i]
notes:
